articles.author: David Shepardson, Nora Eckert
articles.title: GM to exit loss-making Cruise robotaxi business - Reuters
articles.description: General Motors said on Tuesday it will end robotaxi development at its majority-owned, money-losing Cruise business, a blow to the ambitions of the largest U.S. automaker which had made the advanced technology unit a top priority.

articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: Spotify has disabled Car Thing streaming devices - TechCrunch
articles.description: Spotify has officially discontinued Car Thing, its in-car streaming device, with all units now disabled, the company confirmed to TechCrunch.  Spotify has officially discontinued Car Thing, its in-car streaming device, with all units now disabled.
